page.title: 09Weymouth Hospital.
page.content: {Weymouth & District Hospital}is a busy general hospital,which treats in-patients,out-patients and casualties.The main building was built many years ago,but newer wings have been added.The hospital has beds for 130-150 patients. Attached to the hospital is an{ {Ear,Nose and Throat Unit,}in which many children are admitted for treatment to their tonsils.There is also an {Eye Infirmary}. There are casualty, X-Ray, physiotherapy and out-patient departments.There are operating theatres,,an intensive care unit,two orthopaedic wards,two surgical wards and two medical wards. Patients are allowed visitors between2.00 and 8.00 daily. Shaun Porter
